==Abilities and Attacks==
* '''Swing Combo:''' Swings its axe up to 3 times, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

* '''Electro Slime Throw:''' After some time has passed or when the player character is out of reach, the Crackling Axe Mitachurl will dig up Electro Slimes from the ground to charge its axe before throwing it to the player, dealing '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
** When infused, the axe is considered an {{Electro}} entity, and can [[Elemental Reactions|react]] with {{Hydro}}, {{Cryo}}, {{Pyro}}, {{Anemo}}, {{Geo}}; If 3 [[Gauge Unit Theory|gauges]] of {{Cryo}}/{{Pyro}} or 6 gauges of {{Anemo}}/{{Geo}} are applied to the axe, its infusion will be removed.

* '''Axe Spin:''' Spins the axe wildly, rapidly dealing '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Electro DMG}}. At the end of this attack, performs a powerful final swing, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

* '''Axe Dance:''' Performs a two-move dance with its axe to deal '''100% ATK''' and '''150% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}. This attack can only be used while the axe is infused.
** '''Enhanced:''' Enhanced Crackling Axe Mitachurls can be found in certain [[Domains]], [[Spiral Abyss]], overworld events, and challenges. After performing '''Axe Dance''', summons 3 or 4 thunder strikes respectively around it, each dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.

* '''Lightning Axe:''' Raises its axe to summon a powerful lightning to strike down the player character, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. The lightning is so tremendous that it will shock the Mitachurl to the ground, stunning it briefly. This attack is only used during stormy weather or in domains.

* '''Axe Slam:''' Leaps into the air to slam down at the player's location with their axe, dealing '''200% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}. This attack is only performed by enhanced Crackling Axe Mitachurls.
** '''Enhanced:''' Enhanced Crackling Axe Mitachurls can be found in certain [[Domains]], [[Spiral Abyss]], overworld events, and challenges. After performing an infused '''Axe Slam''', summons 3 or 4 thunder strikes respectively around it, each dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
